Read a collection growth plate data.

Source: R/read_plates.R
read_multiple_plates.Rd

This function receives a path to a folder that contains data for several plates. Each plate should have its own file.

Usage

read_multiple_plates(path_target, time_vector = c(), sep = "\t")

Arguments

path_target

The path to plate_file.

time_vector

A numeric vector that indicates the Time at which each measurement was taken. If empty then the Time column from one of the plates is taken as reference.

sep

The delimiter character that separates columns of each file in path_target

Value

A list of two dataframes. An "od_data" dataframe with a common time column and each growth curve in a separate column named with it's "curve_id" (plate_name_well). Also a "metadata" dataframe indicating the well and the original plate from which each "curve_id" is gathered from.
